name: deployer
description: Local deployment tool for the monorepo

scripts.deployer: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run open"
scripts.open: node -e "setTimeout(() => { const { exec } = require('child_process'); exec('start http://localhost:5173'); }, 2000)"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
